s1.ptxt: Stop vehicle on a slope of 5 degrees or more, shift select lever to “P” range and at the same time apply parking brake.
After stopping engine, depress brake pedal and release parking brake.
Then, release brake pedal gradually and check that vehicle remains stationary.
Depress brake pedal and shift select lever to “N” range.
Then, release brake pedal gradually and check that vehicle moves.

attention1.ptxt: Before test, make sure no one is around vehicle or down on a slope and keep watchful for safety during test.

condition.ptxt: Vehicle moves at “P” range or remains stationary at “N” range

ps.ptxt: Defective parking lock pawl or spring
